value: Think that this is marks of some students from last 3 years, you need to calculate the marks of all subjects.
For the above given list the total sum is- 1142.

title: solution
value:
var marks = [
[78, 76, 94, 86, 88],
[91, 71, 98, 65, 76],
[95, 45, 78, 52, 49]
];
var sum=0;
for(var i of marks){
for(var j of i){
sum+=j
}
}
console.log(sum);
